name: Royal Roomba Rumble
description:
Royal Roomba Rumble was made in about 3 hours for the Trijam #215: The 3 hour game jam.

These are not your ordinary roombas. These roombas are bred for one purpose only, to fight! Make sure you stay in the (slowly shrinking) ring. If you find yourself outside of the ring your power starts to drain quickly. So quickly, Get back in the ring!

I hope you enjoy the game! And thanks for playing!

The game can be played with the keyboard or a controller.

Keyboard: 

- Move : ASDW or the arrow keys.

- Changes game mode: E and Q.

- Back to main menu: ESC.

Controller :

- Move : the right stick.

- Changes game mode: Left and right trigger on the controller.

- Back to main menu: Start button
